sentences.en: Accompanied with a local guide from the community, one can spend hours in the dark cave, admiring stalagmites, stalactites, waterfalls, bats, rare eyeless fish-species and more.
sentences.cn: 在当地社区的导游陪伴下，人们可以在黑暗的山洞里花几个小时，欣赏石笋、石钟乳、瀑布、成群的蝙蝠、稀有的盲鱼物种及其他。

sentences.en: Sea urchins brandish their spines on the seafloor near the Channel Islands. Scientists recently discovered that the eyeless invertebrates “see” by detecting light with their spines.
sentences.cn: 海胆在海峡群岛附近的海底挥舞着它们的棘突。科学家最近发现这些没有眼睛的无脊椎动物可以用它们的刺上的探测光来看东西。

sentences.en: The eyeless creature with the quacking voice would never be vaporized.
sentences.cn: 那没眼睛的鸭子嗓也不会给蒸发.

sentences.en: The eyeless sea urchin also has genes associated with taste, smell, hearing, balance - and surprisingly, even vision.
sentences.cn: 这种目盲的海胆同样有着与味觉 、 觉 、 觉和平衡相关的基因 - 至,令人吃惊地是, 还包括视力.

sentences.en: The eyeless sea urchin also has genes associated with taste, smell, hearing, balance — and surprisingly, even vision.
sentences.cn: 这种目盲的海胆同样有着与味觉 、 嗅觉 、 听觉和平衡相关的基因-甚至,令人吃惊地是, 还包括视力.

words.tran_cn: 眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点
看；注视；考虑（eye的过去分词）
